sense.def:
To transfer something from one place or person to another
pomeni nekaj prenesti od ene osebe drugi ali z enega kraja na drugega.

seg.quote: Ten thousand pounds has been transferred into your account.
He transferred the trout to a plate.
Ravenscroft transferred his affections to his secretary.

sense.def:
To be transferred to a different place or job
pomeni znotraj iste ustanove začeti delati v drugem kraju ali na drugem delovnem mestu.

seg.quote: What branch did you say you would like to transfer to?
He had applied for a transfer to the north.
He resisted his transfer to the political section.
